name: Pond
text: You can shuffle a "Duck" card from your GY into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card, then if it’s a "Duck" monster, you can Special Summon it. You can Fusion Summon a "Duck" monster from your Extra Deck by sending "Duck" monster(s) from your hand to the GY. You can only use each effect of "Pond" once per turn.
